LanguageData.Bullet_SeoLi.label: seoli shard
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.label: YP shard rifle
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.description: Compared to a conventional assault rifle, the Yunwha Precision 'Seoli(Frost)' shard rifle is equipped with a larger clip and a higher rate of fire. However, to achieve this the rifle sacrifices damage and armor piercing capability.
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SagPung.label: sagpung swarm
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.label: YP swarmer
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.description: The Yunhwa Precision 'SagPung(Boreas)' swarmer is the short range nanotech weapon. It shoots intelligent nano swarm as its bullet. Fast and incredibly accurate, it is an ideal tool for dealing with soft targets at close range.
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SangAe.label: sangae spike
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.label: YP spike rifle
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.description: Yunhwa precision's 'SangAe(Frost haze)'. Unlike more common rifles, the frost haze fires armor piercing spikes of carbon crystal.
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SeolHwa.label: seolhwa shard
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.label: YP dual wield shard pistols
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.description: A pair of Yunhwa Precision "SeolHwa(Snow blossom)" pistols. The SeolHwa has an extremely short range but while within close range the pistol can tear enemies to pieces.
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Bullet_GeugGwang.label: microwave
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.label: YP microwave emmiter
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.description: Yunhwa Precision "GeugGwang(Aurora)" is a millimeter wave source that boils the water in the target's skin and thus causes incapacitating pain. It is a perfect crowd control weapon.
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_VectorShot.label: smart bolt
LanguageData.YP_VectorShot.label: YP vector shot
LanguageData.YP_VectorShot.description: "NuRi(Hail)" vector shot is a weapon for urban warfare, shots guided system integrated smart bolts. With an aid of multi-spectral scanners, NuRi can aim at targets hidden in cover. While ignoring wall is a really strong feature, however, because of extremely short range, NuRi's function is limited to an assault specialist weapon.
LanguageData.YP_VectorShot.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.YP_VectorShot.tools.1.label: barrel
